languages.text: "Дитя Рассвета, твое могущество... неоспоримо — путь к величию лежит пред тобой. Но знай — чтобы Ткач Судеб избрал именно его для твоего будущего, сейчас тебе нельзя объявлять о своей преданности Темным богам. Сотвори свою первую тайну — сокрой то, что это ты пролил{mf||а} кровь ложноверцев. Солги, дав павшим слугам Темных Богов взять на себя твои деяния. Слыви чемпионом, разителем ереси, сокрушившим гнусных безбожников. Сейчас же позволь агентам Золотого Трона завершить свои тайные махинации. В конце ты пожнешь то, что посеют они, и могуществу твоему не будет предела".

"Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Weaver of Destinies to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilt the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. Gain fame as a champion, the smiter of heresy who has crushed the despicable apostates. And right now, allow the Golden Throne's agents to complete their clandestine machinations. In the end, you will reap what they have sown and your might will know no limits."
languages.original_text: "Дитя Рассвета, твое могущество... неоспоримо — путь к величию лежит пред тобой. traits.locale_text: "Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Fateweaver to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilled the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. Gain fame as a champion, the smiter of heresy who has crushed the despicable apostates. And right now, allow the Golden Throne's agents to complete their clandestine machinations. In the end, you will reap what they have sown, and your might will know no limits."

languages.text: “黎明之子，你的力量……毋庸置疑。通往伟大的道路就摆在你面前，但你要明白，为了让命运编织者为你选择正确的道路，你绝不能让任何人意识到你忠于黑暗诸神。是时候编织你的第一个秘密了，不要让任何人知道是你杀害了那些伪神的信徒。编织你的谎言，假装是黑暗诸神死去的仆人做了这样的事情。赢得勇士之名，消灭那些卑鄙的伪神信徒。至于现在，就先让黄金王座的特工完成他们的密谋。到了最后，你会收获他们种下的种子，你将获得永无止境的力量。”
languages.original_text: "Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Weaver of Destinies to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilt the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. Gain fame as a champion, the smiter of heresy who has crushed the despicable apostates. And right now, allow the Golden Throne's agents to complete their clandestine machinations. In the end, you will reap what they have sown and your might will know no limits."

languages.text: "Kind der Dämmerung, Eure Macht ... ist zweifellos. Euer Pfad zur Größe liegt vor Euch. Doch Ihr solltet wissen: Damit der Weber der Schicksale diesen exakten Pfad für Eure Zukunft wählt, dürft Ihr Eure Verbindung zu den Dunklen Göttern noch nicht preisgeben. Fertigt Euer erstes Geheimnis. Verbergt, dass Ihr es wart, {mf|der|die} das Blut der falschen Gläubigen vergossen hat. Lügt und lasst gefallene Diener der Dunklen Götter die Verantwortung für Eure Taten übernehmen. Erlangt Ruhm als Champion, als {mf|Kämpfer gegen die Ketzerei, der|Kämpferin gegen die Ketzerei, die} die schändlichen Apostaten vernichtet hat. Und gestattet hier und jetzt den Agenten des Goldenen Throns, ihre geheimen Machenschaften abzuschließen. Letztlich werdet Ihr ernten, was sie gesät haben, und Eure Macht wird keine Grenzen kennen."
languages.original_text: "Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Weaver of Destinies to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilt the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. In the end, you will reap what they have sown and your might will know no limits."

traits.locale_text: "Kind der Dämmerung, Eure Macht ... ist zweifellos. Euer Pfad zur Größe liegt vor Euch. Doch Ihr solltet wissen: Damit der Schicksalsweber diesen exakten Pfad für Eure Zukunft wählt, dürft Ihr Eure Verbindung zu den Dunklen Göttern noch nicht preisgeben. Fertigt Euer erstes Geheimnis. Verbergt, dass Ihr es wart, {mf|der|die} das Blut der falschen Gläubigen vergossen hat. Lügt und lasst gefallene Diener der Dunklen Götter die Verantwortung für Eure Taten übernehmen. Erlangt Ruhm als Champion, als {mf|Kämpfer gegen die Ketzerei, der|Kämpferin gegen die Ketzerei, die} die schändlichen Apostaten vernichtet hat. Und gestattet hier und jetzt den Agenten des Goldenen Throns, ihre geheimen Machenschaften abzuschließen. Letztlich werdet Ihr ernten, was sie gesät haben, und Eure Macht wird keine Grenzen kennen."

languages.text: «Vástago del Amanecer, tu poder es... indudable. El camino a la grandeza se abre ante ti. Pero debes saber que el Tejedor de Destinos no podrá depararte ese camino si revelas la lealtad que profesas a los Dioses Oscuros. Guarda tu primer secreto. Oculta que fuiste tú quien derramó la sangre de los falsos creyentes. Miente y deja que los siervos caídos de los Dioses Oscuros se lleven el mérito de tus actos. Acumula fama como adalid y azote de herejes, {mf|aquel|aquella} que ha aplastado a estos despreciables apóstatas. Permite de momento que los agentes del Trono Dorado pergeñen sus maquinaciones clandestinas. Al final serás tú quien coseche lo que ellos siembren, y tu poder no conocerá límites».
languages.original_text: "Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Weaver of Destinies to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilt the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. Gain fame as a champion, the smiter of heresy who has crushed the despicable apostates. And right now, allow the Golden Throne's agents to complete their clandestine machinations. In the end, you will reap what they have sown and your might will know no limits."

languages.text: « Enfant de l'Aube, votre puissance... ne fait aucun doute. La voie de la grandeur s'ouvre à vous, mais sachez une chose : pour que le Tisseur de Destins vous y conduise, vous ne devez pas encore révéler votre allégeance envers les Dieux Sombres. Faites-en votre premier secret. Nul ne doit savoir que vous avez versé le sang de ces faux croyants. Mentez, laissez le mérite revenir aux serviteurs des Dieux Sombres qui sont tombés en faisant leur devoir. Faites-vous connaître en tant que {mf|champion|championne}, le fléau de l'hérésie qui a anéanti ses méprisables apostats. Et pour l'instant, laissez les agents du Trône d'Or accomplir leurs machinations clandestines. Au bout du compte, vous récolterez ce qu'ils auront semé et votre puissance sera sans limites. »
languages.original_text: "Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Weaver of Destinies to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilt the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. Gain fame as a champion, the smiter of heresy who has crushed the despicable apostates. And right now, allow the Golden Throne's agents to complete their clandestine machinations. In the end, you will reap what they have sown and your might will know no limits."

languages.text: 「暁の子よ、お前の力は…疑いない。偉大なる道はお前の目の前に開かれている。だが、知っておけ。運命の操り手にその道を選んでもらうためには、まだ暗黒神への忠誠を明かしてはならない。最初の秘密を作れ。偽信者の血を流したのは自分であることを隠せ。お前の手柄は暗黒神の堕落した下僕のものだと偽れ。卑劣な背教者を弾圧した異端者を打ち砕く王者として名声を得よ。そして今すぐ、黄金の玉座の諜報員に密かな策略を完成させるのだ。最後には、彼らが蒔いた種を刈り取るのだ。お前に限界はないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Child of the Dawn, your might... is doubtless. Your path to greatness lies before you. But you should know that in order for the Weaver of Destinies to choose that exact path for you, you must not disclose your allegiance to the Dark Gods yet. Craft your first secret. Conceal that it was you who spilt the blood of the false believers. Lie and let fallen servants of the Dark Gods take credit for your acts. Gain fame as a champion, the smiter of heresy who has crushed the despicable apostates. And right now, allow the Golden Throne's agents to complete their clandestine machinations. In the end, you will reap what they have sown and your might will know no limits."

traits.locale_text: 「暁の子よ、お前の力は…疑いない。偉大なる道はお前の目の前に開かれている。だが、知っておけ。フェイトウィーバーにその道を選んでもらうためには、まだ暗黒神への忠誠を明かしてはならない。最初の秘密を作れ。偽信者の血を流したのは自分であることを隠せ。お前の手柄は暗黒神の堕落した下僕のものだと偽れ。卑劣な背教者を弾圧した異端者を打ち砕く王者として名声を得よ。そして今すぐ、黄金の玉座の諜報員に密かな策略を完成させるのだ。最後には、彼らが蒔いた種を刈り取るのだ。お前に限界はないだろう」
